alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon; Morris (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 28 at 3:23AM EST until January 29 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Morris and Hunterdon Counties in New Jersey. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snow is expected to begin Friday evening, becoming heavy at times Friday night through Saturday morning. Snow will diminish late Saturday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
